schedule.title: This Week's Stream Schedule
schedule.noteHtml: We finally achieved monetization! Thank you all so much! ğŸ¤ Three years since starting YouTube, and it's so wonderful that all the effort has paid off! I'm also so grateful to be surrounded by all of you â€” my "Jumyou" â€” who enjoy streaming with me and support me! Let's keep living these days slowly together~!

about.title: About
about.bodyHtml:
About
Not a bathroom! I'm Mitarai Asobu!
â™¡ â™¡ â™¡
ğŸ¦
Introduction
Debut Date / Birthday / Fan Name / Support Mark

I'm Mitarai Asobu!!
Half human, half raccoon â€” and a grown-up girl!
I do casual chatting streams in the afternoon and gaming streams at night~

Let's have a great time and make the most of our lifespan~!

Debut Date & Birthdayâ¡ January 3rd
Support Markâ¡ â‹ˆğŸ¦ (bow tie & raccoon)
Fan Nameâ¡ Jumyou (Lifespan)
Good morningâ¡ Ohami-ta
Helloâ¡ Konmi-ta
Good work / See youâ¡ Otsumi-ta
Nice stream (Naisu-pa)â¡ "Kenjou" / "Jumyou no Kenjou" / "Subarashiki Jumyou no Kenjou", etc.

A request ğŸ¤
Please try to avoid using the phrase "Naisu-pa" during my streams!
The reason is that it doesn't carry the weight of your "lifespan"!
âœ¨
Dreams I Want to Achieve
10,000 Subscribers / Soundproof Room Crowdfunding
  • 10,000 channel subscribers by the end of 2026
  • Monetization

Everyone, thank you for your support!! Let's keep pushing forward!

Wish list: Soundproof Room
Crowdfunding is underway!
https://mitaraiasobu.github.io/crowd_funding/index.html

ãƒ»Makes it easier to stream at night
ãƒ»Makes singing streams and recording easier
ãƒ»I can be loud during games without worry
ãƒ»Consideration for neighbors

The OTODASU II-G I'm interested in costs around Â¥200,000, so I want to work hard to save up for it!

Ways to Contribute
  • BOOST when purchasing goods on BOOTH (10% fee)
  • Fan Club (10% fee)
  • YouTube Super Chat or Membership (30%+ fee)
  • Direct support via PayPay (no fee)
  • Bank transfer (please contact me via X DM)

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out via X DM and I'll do my best to answer.

Finally
Anyone who supports with Â¥10,000 or more for the soundproof room will be invited to a supporter-exclusive live stream.
You'll also be given a special ã€Titleã€‘ and recognized at the public "Soundproof Room Launch Celebration Stream."
â€» The name displayed at the ceremony can be customized.

Jumyou everyone, thank you always for your support! I'd be so happy if you could cheer on my dream of getting a soundproof room too. Thank you!

â–¶
Playlist for Watch Time... o,+:ï½¡âœ©
Before bath / Before bed / Help with monetization ğŸ¤

Please play it before you take a bath or go to sleep!
It's a big help for monetization!
In exchange for your phone's battery... please give Asobu some ğ“œğ“¸ğ“·ğ“®ğ”‚ ğŸ¤

â–¶ Playlist here

ğŸ’Œ
Marshmallow
Questions / Compliments / Chat stream topics ğŸ¤

There are submission periods â€” you can't always send messages~
I'd love it if you sent things you'd like me to talk about during casual streams, questions, compliments, etc. ğŸ¤

https://marshmallow-qa.com/g2t47f2przg3nzd

ğŸ‘¶
Background / Appearance
Mama / Papa / Live2D Model Credits

An introduction to my Mama and Papa in Vtuber terms!

ãƒ»Mama (Illustration)

This was created by three parties: a friend, myself, and AI assistance.

First, AI tools like ChatGPT and PixAI were used to establish the overall full-body design.
â€» The images used at this stage were generated by large-scale trained AI models, so they are kept private in consideration of copyright clarity.

Based on those images, my friend and I worked together to reconstruct and refine the details of the design.
The final Live2D illustration is a collaboration between my friend and me. My friend primarily drew the overall work, while I assisted with parts like the facial nuances and accessories.

The Live2D illustration currently in use for my activities does not directly use AI. The AI images were used solely as reference material for the initial concept.

I hope you can watch over my activities with peace of mind.

ãƒ»Papa (Modeling)

The Live2D modeling was handled by Mitarai Asobu (myself).

ãƒ»About my friend

My friend currently works at a general company and is not active as an illustrator. They do not run a public SNS account and do not take commissions.

Please refrain from contacting my friend through me.
Also, my friend will almost never appear in streams or the comment section.

When I say "Mama" during streams, I am referring to my birth mother, not the person who worked on the illustration.

ãƒ»About Future Outfits

At this point, if I create new outfits, I plan to follow the same process as the initial outfit.
If I commission a designer without AI assistance, I will clearly credit them on the outfit introduction page.

ğŸ¤–
Stream Assets / AI Usage
Thumbnails / Logo / Goods policy

In my activities, I use AI for things like stream overlays, props, wonCommerce plugins, emergency logos, and emergency announcement illustrations.

ãƒ»Thumbnail Backgrounds

I often use assets from OKUMONO for thumbnail backgrounds.

ãƒ»Thumbnail Illustrations (images different from Live2D model photos)

I use AI illustrations from tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, PixAI, etc., with additional edits made on top.
They are generated using my own Live2D model images as training input.

ãƒ»Emergency Logos

Logos for contests and things like "I want to greet 50 people" use ChatGPT-generated illustrations.
Only the name logo "Mitarai Asobu" was created by myself, based on a paid proposal from an illustrator.

ãƒ»Images for Direct Commercial Use (e.g., goods images)

For images used directly for sales such as merchandise, I only use Mitarai Asobu's hand-drawn illustrations or work commissioned from an illustrator.
Please check the credit listed on the sales page.

AI-generated or AI-edited images are not used for goods sold directly.

â™¡ â™¡ â™¡
å¾¡æ‰‹æ´— éŠ
Mitarai Asobu

membership.bodyHtml:
Membership
Welcome to the special place for Jumyou
â™¡ â™¡ â™¡
Join YouTube Membership to enjoy a variety of perks!
All plans include the perks of lower tiers.
Starting from Â¥490/month.
Join now ğŸ¤
About Jumyou Alliance
Upper-tier plans / Exclusive goods system / Shipping

The Jumyou Alliance is the collective name for YouTube Membership plans at Â¥1,990 and above.

These were originally established as a fan club, but the name was changed when the fan club was integrated into YouTube Membership.

Staying in the Jumyou Alliance for one year earns you a member card! The card will include my signature, your name, and an issue number.


The flagship perk of the Jumyou Alliance is exclusive goods.

Exclusive goods are not a monthly gift.
They are an irregular perk, available roughly every 2â€“6 months.

Goods schedules are announced as members-only posts on Discord/YouTube.
No schedule or illustrations are announced publicly.
Photos are first revealed publicly during the unboxing stream.

In addition, exclusive goods will not be restocked.

â‹ˆ Schedule Example
Example: White Day goods â€” here's what it looks like â†“
January
Announcement &
Shipping request
February
Production
March
Delivery â™¡
Unboxing Stream
Photos revealed &
SNS posting unlocked
If you are a member in January and submit a shipping request, you can still receive your goods even if you cancel in February.
The above schedule is only an example. Please check the actual schedule after joining the Fan Club.
  • You only need to cover the BOOTH handling fee and Â¥100 shipping.
  • Shipping requests close at the end of the month (e.g., January 31st).
  • Each person can receive one free item per round. If you really want an extra, you can buy one additional item at cost.
  • As goods are made-to-order, shipping requests and additional purchases cannot be cancelled.
  • If you cancel after submitting a shipping request, the goods will still be sent. If you don't want them, please contact us with your order number.
  • Delivery timing may shift due to production status, health, weather, or other events. Progress updates will be shared in the fan club log, whether good or bad.
Asobu's Cute Little Jumyou
Â¥490 / Member-exclusive perks

Â¥490 / month

Included perks:

  • Member badge
  • Custom emoji
  • Members-only chat
  • Members-only live streams
  • Members-only videos
  • Members-only Shorts
  • Shoutouts to members
Jyumyou Alliance
Connected Jumyou
Â¥1,990 / Fan Club "Asobu's Jumyou Alliance" + Exclusive goods + Posts + X private account

Â¥1,990 / month

Join the Fan Club "Asobu's Jumyou Alliance"

You'll get access to Fan Club perks on Discord! Members who stay for a full year receive a signed member card! Core perks include exclusive goods, posts, and the X private account described below.

Note
Please follow the guide video to link your Discord account with YouTube. If you don't have a Discord account, please create one.

Post Reading Access

You can read posts and diary entries I write! Daily life, thoughts on new projects, progress reports, and more! I post at least once a month.

Exclusive Goods

Goods gifts are not monthly â€” they're an irregular perk, available every 2â€“6 months. Details are only revealed to fan club members!

Invited to X Private Account!

You can follow the Fan Club-exclusive X account!
It's not a secret account lol

Past Video Access

You can watch videos and archived streams from before my activity as Mitarai Asobu!

Verified Jumyou
Â¥2,790 / Lower tier perks + Signed shikishi + Limited-time voice clips

Â¥2,790 / month

Signed Shikishi

I'll give you a shikishi (autograph board) with a handwritten signature! Each one is different â€” truly one of a kind ğŸ¤ Delivery timing matches the exclusive goods. A reservation is required to receive it. You can also choose not to reserve if you don't want it.

Limited-Time Voice Clips

I'll post at least one seasonal voice clip per month â€” morning greetings, good-night messages, and more! The voice data can be downloaded while available. It will be set to private after the period ends.

Linked Jumyou
Â¥4,690 / Lower tier perks + Private live stream + Digital drawing request

Â¥4,690 / month

Private Live Stream Just for Two ğŸ¤

Sometimes it's nice to talk one-on-one, right? Maybe a chance to share the thoughts or words you've been wanting to give me...... Questions, chats, advice, games, drawing â€” what do you want to do~? Book a convenient date and time. Please secure at least 15 minutes! I'm looking forward to it.

â€»I'll send you the recording, so save it forever. The archive is private by default, but extreme misconduct may result in it being made public ğŸ–¤

Digital Drawing Request

I'll create an illustration as a gift â€” something you can use as a social media icon or phone wallpaper, a memorable piece just for you!

â€»Only the person who requested it may use the illustration. I'll draw it during a stream! Subject can be your favourite anime character, a car or motorbike, a self-portrait of me â€” anything goes. Expect a quality level similar to what I draw during participatory drawing streams.
Synced Jumyou
Â¥14,000 / Lower tier perks + Scriptable message video

Â¥14,000 / month

Scriptable Message Video

You can specify the exact words you want me to sayâ€¦â€¦ğŸ¤ Prepare a script, or just send a situation and I'll work hard on writing one! Length is negotiable â€” I'll do my best to fulfil it, no matter how long. Don't be shy! Follow the post-join instructions to send your script.

â€»If the script contains anything I can't do, I may ask you to revise it. Don't send anything too embarrassing. Well, actually, go ahead and try? Fortune favours the bold...!
Asobu's Wonderful Gentleman Jumyou ğŸ¤
Â¥68,000 / An overwhelming display of status

Â¥68,000 / month

Showing off to other viewers ğŸ¤

Let them witness the difference in class!

â™¡ â™¡ â™¡
å¾¡æ‰‹æ´— éŠ
Mitarai Asobu

notice.bodyHtml:
Notes & Fan Works
Rules for enjoying things comfortably
â™¡ â™¡ â™¡
Â¥
About Financial Support
Notes regarding refunds

Regarding all financial support including tips, goods purchases, and similar transactions,
we do not offer refunds, and we are unable to respond to such inquiries.

Please make sure you are making an informed decision before supporting.

!
About Official Images and Fan Art
Logo / Official images / Fan art / Common rules

ã€About Logosã€‘

Using official logos in fan works is prohibited.
This is because it can become unclear what is official.

ã€Official Imagesã€‘

â­• Setting as a phone or PC wallpaper
â­• Using as an SNS header
â­• Copying the image as fan art of Mitarai Asobu

âŒ Using as an SNS icon, etc.
âŒ Reposting

Using images as icons or headers is equivalent to re-uploading official images to the internet.
This is uniformly prohibited.

ã€Fan Art Imagesã€‘

â­• Using as an SNS icon

âŒ Claiming it is official
âŒ Using fan art that looks extremely similar to official images as an icon
(Please avoid anything that could be mistaken for official content.)

ã€Regarding All Imagesã€‘

Using a profile associated with Mitarai Asobu to post about topics generally considered inappropriate for Vtubers â€” such as politics or religion â€” may threaten Mitarai Asobu's brand and is therefore prohibited. Thank you for your cooperation.

ğŸ¨
About Paid Illustration Commissions
Skeb, etc. / Posting OK / Reference images

It is OK to commission an illustrator via Skeb or similar services to draw an illustration of Mitarai Asobu!

Posting it on SNS is also OK, but please read the "About Official Images and Fan Art" section above carefully.

When posting, please use the tag #å¾¡æ‰‹æ´—ã¿ãŸã‚‰ï¼Ÿ â€” I'd love to see it ğŸ¤

Please share this site's URL with the illustrator you commission. The following images should be helpful.

I'm sorry a full character reference sheet isn't ready yet ğŸ’¦

The images below are reference materials for illustrators. Please do not use them for other purposes.

Full Body

å…¨èº«2

é¡”1

é¡”2

â–¶
About Official Videos
No falsified clips

Please do not create or post clip videos that have been altered to appear different from the intended content of the original.

ğŸ“°
About Media Coverage
Aggregators / Info sites / News accounts, etc.

Regarding news sites, news accounts, Vtuber information sites, and similar posts:

Please refrain from featuring my activities on news or aggregator sites.

Whether the news is positive or negative, I do not wish for my activities or information to spread beyond the scope that I can be involved in.

I ask that fans make a point not to view or share such posts.

â™¡ â™¡ â™¡
å¾¡æ‰‹æ´— éŠ
Mitarai Asobu

crowdfunding.missionTitle: Get a soundproof room and stop the screaming!
crowdfunding.bodyHtml:
Crowdfunding
I'd be so happy if you could support me as much as you're comfortable with.
â™¡ â™¡ â™¡
Get a soundproof room and stop the screaming!
Goal: Â¥200,000 ï¼ Deadline: No deadline
Ongoing
caluclating... raised!
Supporters: 14
For contributions of Â¥10,000 or more Here's what you'll get ğŸ¤
Special Title
Exclusive Badge
A badge appears on your stream comments â™¡
Exclusive Stream
Exclusive Stream
The archive will be saved too!
ğŸ”Š
Why I Need a Soundproof Room
Purpose / Current challenges / Impact on streaming

Getting a soundproof room is purely about "expanding what I can do in streams." It's not something I need to stream at all, so there's no deadline. I want to take my time collecting funds!

(I think I may have aimed a little too high... so no rush â€” I'd love for you to support me while having fun~)

Purpose

  • Makes it easier to stream at night
  • Makes singing streams and recording easier
  • I can be loud during games without worry
  • Consideration for neighbors

Viewers often comment that my voice is loud (in a fun way), but it really is loud. My regular speaking voice is apparently quite loud too â€” it's because I speak louder than normal to get a good microphone input level. Even with windows and curtains closed, my voice can be heard by neighbors.

I can also hear sounds from neighboring homes â€” babies crying, adults laughing, TV sounds, doors, chairs, and so on â€” all coming into my room. I'm a little worried about those sounds getting picked up in streams, and if I lower the mic sensitivity, my own voice becomes harder to hear.

Currently, my evening live streams run from 8â€“10 PM, but if I get a soundproof room, I'd like to add streams later in the evening past 10 PM. A survey showed that the most popular viewing time among viewers is 9â€“11 PM. I want to stream at various times and try different content without worrying about the impact on those around me.

â‹ˆ You will support me... right? ğŸ–¤
PP
PayPay
One-tap support
0% fee
â¡

Recipient email: mitaraiasobu@gmail.com

set the recipient email to mitaraiasobu@gmail.com.

Mitarai Asobu

    ğŸ“š Layers
    ğŸ¨ Coloring contest deadline: one week after reaching 3,000 subscribers
    ğŸ“– How to Use
    1. Click/drag in the color square area to pick a color (horizontal = saturation, vertical = brightness)
    2. Use the rainbow bar (hue) to select a color family, then adjust brightness and saturation in the square. When you're happy, click "â• Save" to add it to your palette
    3. Select a layer to color from the layer panel (Layer 1 is locked and cannot be changed)
    4. Click the "Paint selected layer" button
    5. Use the ğŸ‘ï¸ icon to toggle layer visibility
    6. When done, click "Download image" or "Post to Twitter"
    Check out other events too
    Deadline: February 28th
    100%
